results.name: Number of integer solutions to a^2 + b^2 + c^2 + 8*d^2 = n.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Liouville, J., Sur la forme X^2 + Y^2 + Z^2 + 8T^2. Journal de mathématiques pures et appliquées 2e série, tome 6 (1861), p. 324-328.
formula: G.f.: theta_3(q)^3*theta_3(q^8), where theta_3() is the Jacobi theta function. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Aug 01 2018
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 15 2014
